TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextComposition extends System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject

Docs.summary: Represents a composition related to text input which includes the composition text itself, any related control or system text, and a state of completion for the composition.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

Docs.param: An input manager to associate with this text composition.
A source element for this text composition. The object underlying the source element must implement the interface.
A string containing the initial text for the composition. This parameter will become the value of the property in the new class instance.
